adjacent_analytics.title: [ARFC] Add XAUt to Aave v3 Core Instance
adjacent_analytics.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193

decision.summary: The proposal recommends deploying Aave v3 on the Plasma blockchain, a new high-performance Layer 1 blockchain optimized for stablecoins with zero fees and rapid transaction finality. The deployment includes onboarding of several assets with detailed risk parameters and capital efficiency modes. The proposal has strong early voter support and is backed by risk assessments from LlamaRisk and ChaosLabs, who note the network is in early stages but see no infrastructural blockers. Historical similar proposals for onboarding assets to Aave v3 instances have mostly resulted in positive TVL impact and community acceptance.
key_arguments_for: Plasma offers a scalable, high-performance blockchain environment with zero-fee USD₮ transfers, ideal for Aave deployment.
Risk assessments by LlamaRisk and ChaosLabs support the deployment with detailed technical, market, and security analyses.
The proposal includes conservative risk parameters and capital efficiency modes to mitigate potential liquidity and volatility risks.
Similar past proposals for onboarding assets to Aave v3 have led to positive TVL growth and enhanced ecosystem development.
key_arguments_against: Plasma network is in an early developmental phase with no public mainnet at the time of assessment, posing technical and security uncertainties.
Limited on-chain data and absence of some audited contracts introduce risk.
Centralization concerns exist due to initial validator control and token allocation.
Some community members and risk providers recommend continued monitoring before full deployment.

evidence.quote: LlamaRisk supports a provisional recommendation for Aave to deploy on Plasma pending further analysis; ChaosLabs notes early development but sees no immediate blockers; bgdlabs preliminarily confirms no infrastructural blockers and recommends proceeding.
Similar proposals such as 'Automation of the Slope2 Parameter via Risk Oracles' and 'Onboard tBTC to Aave v3 on Base' were successful with positive TVL impact, supporting deployment decisions.

decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'YAE' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
• The timeline metrics show overwhelming early and stable support for the 'YAE' option, with lead ratios close to 99% in favor throughout all quartiles.
• Market impacts indicate a positive TVL increase (~5.6%) post-proposal, consistent with healthy ecosystem growth.
• Adjacent similar proposals, like onboarding tBTC to Aave v3 on Base, resulted in positive TVL and price impacts, suggesting successful outcomes when adopting new assets and chains.
• Forum sentiment, reflected in community discussions and expert risk assessments, is cautiously supportive, endorsing the deployment while acknowledging early-stage risks.
• The recommendation to 'Change' aligns with aggregated forum sentiment and expert analyses, supporting the long-term health and expansion of Aave's ecosystem on emerging Layer 1s.
• Historical lessons from similar proposals highlight the benefits of careful risk parameterization and phased activation, which are incorporated here to mitigate risks.
• Overall, the recommendation mirrors community sentiment and voter dynamics, advocating for the deployment with prudent risk management and monitoring.
